fields.description:
The {{Ti.WatchSession.activate()}} method has to be called before the Titanium can receive events from the Watch. This is how it works in a Xcode app as well.

However, when you one of the {{Ti.WatchSession}} properties or methods it session is activated automatically.

I'd suggest to automatically activate the session when the user adds event listeners to {{Ti.WatchSession}} as well so that there's no need anymore for {{Ti.WatchSession.activate()}}.

The need to (sometimes) call {{activate()}} is something people easily forget and I expect it to cause Q&A question like _Why doesn't my Titanium app receive events from the Watch?_.
fields.summary: Remove the need to call Ti.WatchSession.activate()
